SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT510
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account servicer (account servicing Institution) to an account owner . The account owner may be a global custodian which has an account with its local agent (sub custodian), a local agent (sub custodian) which has an account with its clearing agent or registration provider, a financial institution which has an account with its local agent (sub custodian).
This message is used to:
a) advise the status of a registration instruction or modification previously sent by the account owner (the function of the message is INST),
b) advise the status of the registration process (the function of the message is REGT),
c) reply to a cancellation request previously sent by the account owner (the function of the message is CAST).

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CAST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a cancellation request status.

Code.Name: INST
Code.Description: Message reporting on an instruction status.

Code.Name: REGT
Code.Description: Message reporting on the status of the registration processing at the issuer/registrar.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Qualifier is CPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Cancellation has been completed.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation is pending. It is not known at this time whether cancellation can be affected.

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Cancellation will not be executed.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been acknowledged for further processing by the account servicer.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Cancellation has been rejected for further processing.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation request from yourself for this instruction is pending waiting for further processing.

Code.Name: NOTC
Code.Description: Instruction can not be cancelled because the issuer/registrar has already started the registration.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged/accepted for further processing.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is RERC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25) :

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Registration has been acknowledged/accepted by the issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Registration has been rejected by the issuer/registrar.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as you requested.

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the system.

Code.Name: CREG
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is DEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: DCAN
Code.Description: Cancellation request was denied since the instruction has already been cancelled.

Code.Name: DPRG
Code.Description: Cancellation request was denied because the registration is in progress.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PACK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: RQWV
Code.Description: Instruction registration is accepted but the registration is not in full, ie, not with voting rights.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REJT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24) :

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the account servicer's deadline.

Code.Name: BPAR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Business Partner Number.

Code.Name: BREF
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Bank Reference Number.

Code.Name: DADR
Code.Description: Address details are incorrect or can not be recognised, eg, unknown city.

Code.Name: DORD
Code.DetailedName: Registration Request Data and Order Rejection
Code.Description: Disagreement between the data on the registration request and the order.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid quantity of financial instrument.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline for the registration date specified.

Code.Name: MCER
Code.Description: Missing certificate.

Code.Name: MLEG
Code.Description: Missing legal power for transfer.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NRGN
Code.Description: Cancellation has been rejected since the instruction could not be found.

Code.Name: OWNT
Code.Description: Type of ownership indicated is not correct.

Code.Name: REQM
Code.Description: Registration request to be completed by the buyer and to be forwarded to the issuer is missing.

Code.Name: REQW
Code.Description: Registration request to be completed by the buyer and to be forwarded to the issuer is wrong. You have used the registration request of a different issuer/registrar.

Code.Name: RREA
Code.Description: Registration reason indicated is not correct.

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SHAR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Shareholder Number.

Code.Name: SIGN
Code.Description: Registration request does not have a valid signature of the owner of the financial instrument.

Code.Name: STAM
Code.Description: Financial instrument is not ceded (stamped and/or duly signed).

Code.Name: STAT
Code.Description: Missing statutes or commercial register or other legal documents.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Comment: Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .

Name (Format Option U) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .
When Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95) :

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CHTY
Code.Description: Number assigned to a tax exempt entity.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's license.

Code.Name: FIIN
Code.Description: Number assigned to a foreign investor (other than the alien number).

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Qualifier.Name: QREG
Qualifier.Description: Quantity of Financial Instrument to be Registered

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-35B-A ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: Split("\r\n", $value.Description_Of_Security)[0] + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";
